entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add TODO's for Code Violations #57055
  • Refactoring suggestion to turn string. Format into interpolated strings #57054
  • Automatically change namespace hierarchy after moving code files #57053
  • adding Copy function beside method #57052
  • Support auto formatting C # #57051
  • Test plan for "params Span<T>" #57049
  • Test plan for "Primary Constructors" #57048
  • Test plan for "Attributes on Main for top level programs" #57047
  • Test plan for "required properties" #57046
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis appears to report false FlowState, when a switch handles null #57042
  • Red squiggly line in VS when diagnostic is suppressed #57041
  • Possibly incorrect error with explicit conversion of stackalloc to pointer #57040
  • remove redundant assignment IDE0059 not working #57035
  • File scoped namespace prevents contained using statements from being collapsible #57032
  • Hovering over the dot before an invocation shows wrong overload #57031
  • Toplevel Statements and Source Code generation does not work together (CS0759) #57030

PullRequests

Created

  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not pass out a pooled array builder to the editor in lightbulbs #57045
    Area-IDE
  • Disable completion latency guards for integration tests #57044
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Error when ref is used on a parameter or return type of an UnmanagedCallersOnly method #57043
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57039
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • BoundFixedLocalCollectionInitializer - use BoundConversion nodes to represent element pointer conversion. #57038
    Area-Compilers
  • Add experiment to disable weak compilation refs in the compilation tracker #57037
    Area-IDE
  • Add a remote-control flag to disable storing runtime metadata assemblies weakly. #57036
    Area-IDE
  • Add a remote-control flag to allow us to effectively disable branch-ids #57034
    Area-IDE
  • Separate global and solution completion options #57033
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Null annotate FileCodeModel and the code model service #57026
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • BoundCompoundAssignmentOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54472
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Exclude the traits file from codeowners #57021
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • List patterns: Correctly report the missing member #56287
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • EE: ignore modules with bad metadata headers #57015
    Interactive-Debugging, Next
  • Add missing commits that weren't in the blame ignore #57019
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57023
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57024
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57056
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List patterns: add more tests and fix nullability analysis #53822
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Record status for "Semi-auto-properties" #57013
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • BoundForEachStatement - use BoundConversion nodes to represent conversions in the node. #57010
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Reimplement the logic for remove-unnecessary-cast. #56932
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix named mutex workaround for .NET Mono runtime #57003
    Area-Compilers
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Log unexpected cancellation state in RemoteCallback<T> #57005
    Area-IDE
  • BoundConvertedSwitchExpression - do not store Conversion in the node. #57022
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle switch expressions inside function pointer invocations. #56991
    Area-Compilers
  • BoundAsOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #56941
    Area-Compilers
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Don't offer to simply to an alias if it has a different meaning #57001
    Area-IDE
